content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information and Physical Security:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please ensure that you understand the terms of your EPAM NDA and the Apple NDA. All confidentiality obligations that EPAM employees have to EPAM also apply with respect to EPAM employees' treatment of Apple information. Everything at Apple should be considered confidential information. Limit information sharing related to working information, meetings, documents, sites, etc., unless prior approvals have been provided by your EPAM Delivery or Account Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Always follow all EPAM and Apple Information and Physical Security Policies.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never share passwords to any Apple account with anyone (temp, vendor or Apple employee). Do not use the same password for other accounts including your EPAM account.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use your Apple account only for work on Apple assignments. Do not log on to the Apple corporate network or Apple email from any personal device (laptop, tablet, phone) and or use these devices to access or transfer Apple information. To work remotely, you must have permission from your EPAM manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never leave Apple laptop unattended. If it is stolen or lost report it to your EPAM manager immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use your EPAM email/account for work related to EPAM and Apple for any work related to Apple project. You have 2 accounts (EPAM and Apple account). Please use both and check emails at least every day. Any conversation related to EPAM should be sent through EPAM email, and any conversation related to Apple should be sent through Apple email.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Physical documentation should be put in shred bins after you are finished with the work, and locked if still needed for work. Do not print document to take it home or outside of Apple.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not transfer any Apple data onto any storage device (USB stick, CD, phone, etc.).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not download illegal or unsafe files or software onto an Apple computer/ phone/ tablet.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees should carry an Apple badge at all times while on Apple premises and not try to enter without the badge.Â  Employees should not badge in other individuals even if you know them. When your badge is not working, or if you forget your badge, EPAM employees should contact the Apple security office or your EPAM Manager. Do not lose your Apple badge, and do not loan it. If it is stolen or lost, report it to your EPAM manger immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not bring friends / family to the Apple worksite. If an exception is needed, seek prior approval from your EPAM Delivery or Account Manager and follow Apple security rules.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Upon ending an Apple assignment, EPAM employees must follow all protocols provided by your EPAM Manager to return Apple equipment and information.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
